name: Where Am I? - Locality info
description: Where Am I - Locality info is designed to provide detailed administrative boundary information for your current locality and in the language of your choice.  The app implements a completely new approach to identifying the locality information. The method is exceptionally fast with each response being generated with sub-millisecond timing, allowing for true real-time applications.  The app is multilingual and currently supports 147 languages making it super useful.  Locality information is carefully linked to relevant Wiki pages to reveal additional open-source data about your location. Unlock the massive data source in just two clicks.  Get your GPS data in various formats Decimal, DMS.  Powered by www.BigDataCloud.com API services.
